hero.headline: A warm glowing welcome awaits you

location.headline: Awaken your beauty in the heart of North Devon's tranquility
location.content:
Beauty Awakening, by Chantelle is set in the stunning and tranquil gardens
of Castle Hill, Filleigh, North Devon.

cta.headline: Unwind, Rejuvenate, and Rediscover Your Glow!
cta.content:
Whether you want to indulge in a dreamy facial and float away for a little
while, or a gorgeous massage to take those aches and pains away… there is
something here for everyone.

Please take a look at my treatment menu to see all treatments available, and please don’t hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions at all.

Have a beautiful day, and I can’t wait to meet you. Chantelle x
